title: Transgender former student sues Missouri school for making her use boys' bathroom
description: A transgender former student sued a Missouri school district on Monday for forcing her to use the boys' bathrooms or the high school's only single-stall bathroom.

title: A scorching winter: Argentina's capital breaks record for hottest start to August in 117 years
description: It was an unusually scorching winter day in Buenos Aires Tuesday, with thermometers in Argentina's capital crossing the 30-degree Celsius mark (86 degrees Fahrenheit), the hottest start of August in 117 years of records, according to the country's National Meteorological Service.

title: Trump charged by U.S. Justice Department for efforts to overturn his 2020 presidential election loss
description: Donald Trump was indicted on felony charges Tuesday for working to overturn the results of the 2020 presidential election in the run-up to the violent riot by his supporters at the U.S. Capitol, as the Justice Department moved to hold him accountable for his efforts to block the peaceful transfer of power.

title: Jury weighs death penalty or life in prison for Pittsburgh synagogue shooter
description: A jury deliberated but did not reach a decision Tuesday on whether the man who killed 11 people at a Pittsburgh synagogue should receive the death penalty or life in prison without parole.

title: It's Kamala Harris vs. Ron DeSantis in the fight over Florida's new teachings on slavery
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis, facing heavy criticism for defending "anti-woke" teaching in Florida, this week teed up an unusual proposal to the nation's first Black vice president: Come debate the merits of the state's new curriculum on African-American history.

title: Video footage, teamwork with police helped find man accused of firing at Jewish school in Memphis
description: Information from video cameras, a close relationship with police and years of work to bolster safety measures kept a man with a gun out of a Jewish school and helped officers find him after he fired shots outside the building, a Jewish security organization said Tuesday.

title: Man gets 40 years for prison escape bid months before expected release date from 7-year sentence
description: A Mississippi man was sentenced Monday to 40 years in state prison for breaking out of a correctional facility and holding two people at gunpoint last year, just months before he was to have completed a seven-year sentence.

title: Niger crisis deepens as European nations evacuate and coup leaders get support from other juntas
description: France, Italy and Spain announced evacuations from Niger for their citizens and other European nationals Tuesday, concerned that they risked becoming trapped by a military coup that won backing from three other West African nations also ruled by mutinous soldiers.

title: 16 workers killed in the collapse of a crane being used to build a bridge in India
description: A huge crane collapsed at a highway construction site in western India, killing at least 16 workers, the country's National Disaster Response Force said Tuesday

title: 'Oh my God!' Airborne car lands in sewing blogger's front yard during video
description: A sewing blogger was in the middle of recording a video when an airborne car crashed into the front yard of her Florida home.
